content:
# Medallion: Bronze | HIVE: I | Mission: Alpha
# 🕸️ THREAD_ALPHA_MANIFEST.yaml

mission:
  id: "THREAD_ALPHA"
  name: "HFO Bootstrapping"
  binary_pair: "THREAD_OMEGA"
  duality: "Yin / Yang | Form / Function | Binary Core"
  symbiotic_vision: "VENOM (KING IN BLACK): 24/7 autonomous cognitive symbiote deeply intertwined with biological life (Emails, Calendar, Exercise, Diet). Reclaiming JADC2 ability (Sense, Make Sense, Act, Assess, Learn). Human-as-Swarm paradigm."
  vision: "Intentional Binary Split: Thread Alpha (FORM/ORCHESTRATION) & Thread Omega (FUNCTION/TOOLS). Prevent Earth's solar consumption (~8bn years). Transform Gaia and continue the strange loop beyond the solar transitional phase."
  hive_8_def: "HYPER FRACTAL OBSIDIAN HOURGLASS (Cognitive Symbiote Swarm Mission Engineering Platform)"
  current_project: "Bootstrapping HFO"
  phase: "HIVE: I (Interlock)"

objectives:
  completed:
    - id: "P7_G88_2"
      title: "H-Phase Double Diamond (8-1-8-1)"
      desc: "H1: 8x P0 Shards -> H2: Baton A (Sense) -> H3: 8x P7 Shards -> H4: Baton B (Strategy). Integrated HubV6."
    - id: "P4_G88_1"
      title: "Book of Blood Grudges"
      desc: "Initialized Port 4 violation ledger. Formalized as P4 Strange Loop [2026-01-11]."
    - id: "P5_G88_3"
      title: "Dance of Death and Rebirth"
      desc: "Initialized Port 5 resurrection ledger. Formalized as P5 Strange Loop [2026-01-11]."
    - id: "P5_G88_1"
      title: "Automated Quarantine"
      desc: "P5 Demotion manager for failed receipts active."
    - id: "P5_G88_2"
      title: "PARA Migration"
      desc: "Hot Layer structure aligned with cold PARA architecture."
    - id: "P0_G88_3"
      title: "PORT-0-OBSERVE Sense Local"
      desc: "Greptile/Context7 alternatives (P4/P5 Local) implemented and tested."
    - id: "P0_G88_4"
      title: "Stigmergy Sensing"
      desc: "Port 0 now senses Hot/Cold blackboards (Pillar 3) with SCREAM logic."
  active:
    - id: "P7_G88_2"
      title: "H-Phase Double Diamond (8-1-8-1)"
      desc: "H1: 8x P0 Shards -> H2: Baton A (Sense) -> H3: 8x P7 Shards -> H4: Baton B (Strategy). All within H-Phase Hunt."
    - id: "P0_G88_2"
      title: "Consolidated PORT-0-OBSERVE"
      desc: "Unified 8-pillar manifold (Web, Code, Docs, Acad, Fact, Stigmergy, Prov)."
    - id: "P4_G88_2"
      title: "8-Scream Logic"
      desc: "Implementing specific entropy detectors (Theater/Pollution)."
  missing:
    - id: "P1_G88_1"
      title: "Zod 6.0 Bridge"
      desc: "Formal TypeScript schemas for cross-port communication."
    - id: "P6_G88_1"
      title: "DuckDB Telemetry"
      desc: "Stigmergy data persistence layer."

backlog:
  - "Galois Lattice 8x8 encoding system"
  - "Multi-model family coordination (Spore Storm)"
  - "Tamper-evident Receipt generator (P6)"

provenance:
  created: "2026-01-09T22:30:00Z"
  commander: "P7 Spider Sovereign"
  medallion: "Bronze"

# Medallion: Bronze | HIVE: I | Mission Architecture
hfo_mission_architecture:
  version: "88.1.0"
  threads:
    alpha:
      name: "Integrated Cognitive Symbiosis"
      id: "THREAD_ALPHA"
      doctrine: "JADC2 C2 Node"
      narrative_anchor: "Venom / King in Black"
      goal: "Establish Neural Command Cloud for seamless Human-System Teaming"
      commander_focus: "P7 Navigate / PORT-1-BRIDGE"
    omega:
      name: "Dynamic Effect Synthesis"
      id: "THREAD_OMEGA"
      doctrine: "Virtualized Ordnance"
      narrative_anchor: "Iron Man / Dr. Strange / Green Lantern"
      goal: "On-demand functional manifestation of virtual toolsets from user intent"
      commander_focus: "PORT-0-OBSERVE / PORT-3-INJECT"
  heuristics:
    - "Mosaic Warfare Tiles"
    - "MTG Sliver Collective Synergy"
    - "Stigmergy Blackboard Coordination"
    - "Hyper-heuristic Hindsight Recovery"

# Medallion: Bronze | Mutation: 0% | HIVE: I
# P7 FRACTAL OCTREE: Context Sharding Abstractions
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# PURPOSE: Remove magic numbers from Port 7 and provide a hierarchical scalar
# for context window management across different LLM generations.
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

fractal_root:
  name: "G88_CHROMEBOOK_V1_BUDGET"
  total_tokens: 65536  # Theoretical upper bound for turn context
  safety_margin: 0.2    # 20% reserved for tool overhead

octant_navigator:
  name: "PORT_7_NAVIGATE"
  share: 0.125         # 1/8th of the global context
  master_budget_scalar: 8192 # Calculated as total_tokens * share

  shards:
    T0_SENSE: 1024
    T1_BRIDGE: 1024
    T2_SHAPE: 1024
    T3_INJECT: 1024
    T4_DISRUPT: 1024
    T5_DEFEND: 1024
    T6_STORE: 1024
    T7_NAVIGATE: 1024

degradation_thresholds:
  hard_floor: 128     # LOSS_ZONE: Information density is too high/lossy
  soft_floor: 512     # CAUTION_ZONE: Compressed summaries only
  nominal: 1024       # STABLE_ZONE: Standard 8-step thinking
  high_fidelity: 4096 # ELITE_ZONE: Detailed chain-of-thought
